mapper.select: SELECT a.CONFM_NO AS "confmNumber" , a.CONFM_RQESTER_ID AS "confmRqesterId" , b.USER_NM AS "confmRqesterNm" , a.CONFM_DE AS "confmDe" , a.CONFM_TY_CODE AS "confmTyCode" , d.CODE_NM AS "confmTyCodeNm" , a.CONFM_STTUS_CODE AS "confmSttusCode" , e.CODE_NM AS "confmSttusCodeNm" , a.OPERT_TY_CODE AS "opertTyCode" , g.CODE_NM AS "opertTyCodeNm" , a.TRGET_JOB_TY_CODE AS "trgetJobTyCode" , f.CODE_NM AS "trgetJobTyNm" , a.TRGET_JOB_ID AS "trgetJobId" , a.OPERT_ID AS "opertId" FROM COMTN_CONFM_HISTORY a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMVN_USER_MASTER b ON a.CONFM_RQESTER_ID = b.USER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CODE, CODE_NM FROM COMTC_CMMN_DETAIL_CODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'COM006') d ON a.CONFM_TY_CODE = d.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CODE, CODE_NM FROM COMTC_CMMN_DETAIL_CODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'COM007') e ON a.CONFM_STTUS_CODE = e.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CODE, CODE_NM FROM COMTC_CMMN_DETAIL_CODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'COM003') f ON a.TRGET_JOB_TY_CODE = f.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CODE, CODE_NM FROM COMTC_CMMN_DETAIL_CODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'COM032') g ON a.OPERT_TY_CODE = g.CODE WHERE a.CONFMER_ID = #{confmerId} AND a.CONFM_NO = #{confmNumber}
